content: in between stitch purl just worked and the next stitch purl into no stitch back of this thread slip one to cable needle hold in front k1 pick up stitches from the cast on edge tbl k1 tbl from cable needle slip one to cable needle hold in back k1 pick up one stitch in the gap between the tbl k1 tbl from cable needle cast on edge and the stitches which were on slip one to cable needle hold in front p1 waste yarn work through the back loop to k1 tbl from cable needle prevent holes slip one to cable needle hold in back k1 knit two stitches together as if they were a tbl p1 from cable needle single stitch black horizontal lines indicate stitches slip one stitch then slip the next insert left which need to get transferred onto waste needle into the front loops of the slipped yarn as necessary for the thumb and the stitches and knit them together from this pinky in the charts in the given example position through the back loops the fi rst round normal knit symbols are worked as usual on the second round you cast on stitches using backward loop thread 5 sts on waste yarn method chart 1 cuff © julia mueller - page 4 - chart 2 cable panel the red box marks the repeat section for the cable columns size s leave out the green and yellow columns and stop after round 37 size m leave out the yellow columns and stop arter round 41 size l work all the columns and all rounds chart 4 ribbing part 2 chart 3 ribbing part 1 © julia mueller - page 5 - © julia mueller - page 6 - s dnah thgir 5 trahc m dnah thgir 5 trahc l dnah thgir 5 trahc © julia mueller - page 7 - s dnah tfel 6 trahc m dnah tfel 6 trahc l dnah tfel 6 trahc chart 7 thumb size s chart 7 thumb size m chart 7 thumb size l please note this patt ern is for per- sonal use only any commercial use is strictly prohibited if you have any questi ons suggesti ons or correcti ons please get in contact with me larisknit@gmx de / laris on © julia mueller ravelry - page 8 -
